body.p: In December 2007 the Board decided to defer its work on a framework for disclosure and instead wait for the phase Boundaries of financial reporting, and presentation and disclosure (phaseÂ E) of the conceptual framework project. The Board noted that phase E includes the development of disclosure principles. Consequently, the Board views phase E of the conceptual framework as the appropriate project to resolve questions about the placement of disclosures in the financial reports.
